location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter to John Beaumont and George Green, Factors at Bushire from William Hornby, Daniel Draper, Thomas Hosym and Nathaniel Stackhouse at Bombay Castle

physicalDescription.extent: The item is damaged with a large section of text missing in the top right corner of it.

mods.abstract: Letter discusses trade and financial matters including directions for what to do with the food on board of the Revenge. Shipped by the Revenge.
